creator: nd@perlig.de

text:
> Why should it?

Because you don't want the default install to be insecure.

> How should it know, which privileges the httpd user should get?

What kind of privileges do you mean?

> Does the installer always have privileges to create a new user?
etc. pp.

Maybe, maybe not. Is that relevant?
If you have the privilege to install a service and to write to \program files\, 
you are very likely to also have the privilege to create a new user.
If you don't, you can always use LocalService (which is an existing user).
